body:
Comment 8: 
I have added test in this commit http://golang.org/cl/5656048. So maybe we can
close this issue. The only problem I still have the test TestCtrlBreak does not run by
default. I could not enable it to run always because it sends CtrlBreak to a "process
group", whatever that means. It was killing cmd.exe running the test (since cmd.exe does
not have CtrlBreak handler). I was concerned about windows gobuilders.

Alex
